title: Zeus
description: The king of the gods, ruler of Mount Olympus, and god of the sky, lightning, and thunder.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.

title: Athena
description: The goddess of wisdom, warfare, and crafts. She is known for her strategic skill in battle.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.

title: Poseidon
description: The god of the sea, earthquakes, and horses. He wields the trident as his symbol of power.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate2.

title: Hades
description: The god of the underworld and the dead. He rules over the afterlife from his dark kingdom.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.

title: Heracles
description: A legendary hero known for his incredible strength and the completion of the Twelve Labors.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.

title: Medusa
description: A monstrous creature with snakes for hair whose gaze turns people to stone.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.

title: Cerberus
description: The three-headed dog that guards the entrance to the underworld.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.
